channel.title: Re-Opening the Server Advertisement Board
channel.description:
I have brought this up before but it has always been instantly shot down from people.
This board would be great for servers to advertise on and try to grow their player population or website population (as in forums for their server). It would also bring a new board which would draw large amounts of posts due to how much people want to advertise their server. These new people using this board would then continue to view other sections of moparscape, such as downloads and tutorials. I think we would see big use of the board because a lot of people do not like the status page the most because it is hard to get noticed on. Also, People are constantly posting advertisements for their servers all over the forums. They would now have a board they could post in and not break the rules.
The issues with this possible board have always been the moderation which I think could be handled easily. The staff members are worried about people abusing the board. I feel the only big issue that could happen with this board would be people posting their server over and over again.
Thank you very much for reading this through,
-Marcbob
Please post comments about this suggestion.

item.title: Re-Opening the Server Advertisement Board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:70, topic:444084”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=546767.msg4013398#msg4013398 date=1339427865]

Just a quick question… Would members be able to create a thread where others can post or would it just be that single advertisement?

Someone pointed out that there would be no point in the board if you can post your server and nobody can respond. Because it would just get flushed out with all the servers being added daily. If you make it by post, the more talked about servers would be in the front of course, then the crappier servers would move to the back.

Ah, that first part is true, silly me! As for the latter part, I’m pretty sure spammers would keep bumping the ‘crappier’ servers up to the top anyways, and that was my main concern.

As I believe, this is one of the original reasons double posting has been forbidden for years on this community. No double posting means other users have to bump it. At that point, it’s a fair battle to the topic.
[/quote]

But the other users that bump it could be friends with the OP and were told by OP to bump the topic, etc… which is my concern. It may turn into a spam-fest.[/quote]

And there’s always the option to ban someone from posting in that board. We didn’t have that last time.

Read full topic
